AD_DepartingBrave.synopsis: AD used by this goblin as it impatiently awaits departure for the raid.

AD_BossLeaving2.synopsis: a goblin warchief shouts orders to raiders as he gathers them for a raid

AD_WithChief.synopsis: The drow commander (Minthara) and a goblin warchief bicker about their plans to catch some thieving adventurers.

AD_CunningLeaving.synopsis: AD used when this goblin makes its way out to the Goblin Camp entrance before leaving for Attack on Den.

AD_WaitingBrave.synopsis: AD used by this goblin as it impatiently awaits departure for the raid.

AD_WaitingBold.synopsis: AD used by this goblin as it impatiently awaits departure for the raid.

AD_DrowLeaving1.synopsis: a drow commander orders a goblin warchief to gather his raiding party

AD_WaitingHardy.synopsis: AD used by this goblin as it impatiently awaits departure for the raid.

AD_BossLeaving4.synopsis: a goblin warchief shouts orders to raiders as he gathers them for a raid

AD_WaitingCunning.synopsis: AD used by this goblin as it impatiently awaits departure for the raid.

AD_WaitingStupid.synopsis: AD used by this goblin as it impatiently awaits departure for the raid.

AD_WithPatrol.synopsis: A warchief is reporting to the Drow about the torture.

AD_DrowLeavingReady.synopsis: a drow commander barks orders to an assembled raiding party, preparing them for a raid

AD_DepartingGrumpy.synopsis: AD used by this goblin as it impatiently awaits departure for the raid.

AD_DrowLeaves.synopsis: a drow commander marshalls a raiding party of goblins as they prepare to set out on a raid

AD_AttackOnDen.synopsis: A drow commander orders her goblin forces into battle at the druid grove

AD_ArrogantLeaving.synopsis: AD used when this goblin makes its way out to the Goblin Camp entrance before leaving for Attack on Den.

AD_WaitingGrumpy.synopsis: AD used by this goblin as it impatiently awaits departure for the raid.

AD_BossLeaving1.synopsis: a goblin replies to a drow commander, ordering him to gather a raiding party

AD_DepartingChieftain.synopsis: AD used by this goblin as it impatiently awaits departure for the raid.

AD_WaitingLush.synopsis: AD used by this goblin as it impatiently awaits departure for the raid.

AD_DrowLeaving2.synopsis: a drow commander gathers goblin raiders as she prepares to lead a raid

AD_DepartingLush.synopsis: AD used by this goblin as it impatiently awaits departure for the raid.

AD_WaitingArrogant.synopsis: AD used by this goblin as it impatiently awaits departure for the raid.

AD_CapturedExecuted.synopsis: a drow commander orders a prisoner to be thrown into a spider pit, as an execution

AD_DrowLeaving3.synopsis: a drow commander gathers goblin raiders as she prepares to lead a raid

AD_WaitingHefty.synopsis: AD used by this goblin as it impatiently awaits departure for the raid.

AD_CapturedSpared.synopsis: the drow commander at the goblin camp dismisses a goblin who let her down - the goblin was due to be executed but players intervened and saved her life, but the drow is still furious.

AD_WaitingChieftain.synopsis: AD used by this goblin as it impatiently awaits departure for the raid.

AD_BossLeaving3.synopsis: a goblin warchief shouts orders to raiders as he gathers them for a raid

AD_CoalTrioLeaving.synopsis: AD used between the three raiders standing by the coal fire after they get called to the entrance by the Goblin Boss as they make their way there.

AD_StupidLeaving.synopsis: AD used when this goblin makes its way out to the Goblin Camp entrance before leaving for Attack on Den.

AD_DepartingBrave_0.speaker: Rozzak
AD_DepartingBrave_0.text: Outta the way! First kill is mine!
AD_DepartingBrave_0.context: NodeContext: rowdy, pushing through a crowd to go and participate in a raid

AD_BossLeaving2_0.speaker: Rozzak
AD_BossLeaving2_0.text: Look sharp, feck-shites. We're headin' out on a raid.
AD_BossLeaving2_0.context: NodeContext: annoyed - shouting orders at goblins as they prepare to head out on a raid

AD_WithChief_3.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_WithChief_3.text: The village to the east - it's abandoned?

AD_WithChief_15.speaker: Rozzak
AD_WithChief_15.text: Looks that way. But scouts said they heard somethin' movin' around out there. Somethin' big.
AD_WithChief_15.context: NodeContext: looking over a warmap with his commander

AD_WithChief_5.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_WithChief_5.text: It's not our concern. Our prey are elsewhere.

AD_WithChief_10.speaker: Rozzak
AD_WithChief_10.text: Prisoner'll talk, yer ladyship. Spike always makes 'em talk.
AD_WithChief_10.context: NodeContext: trying to appease a superior - 'Spike' is a goblin torturer -

AD_WithChief_4.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_WithChief_4.text: If he doesn't, I'll cut out his tongue.

AD_WithChief_0.speaker: Rozzak
AD_WithChief_0.text: If he don't have a tongue, he can't tell us nothin'!
AD_WithChief_0.context: NodeContext: surprised, speaking to a superior... afraid of her

AD_WithChief_8.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_WithChief_8.text: The prisoner can keep his tongue - it's Spike's I'll be removing.

AD_WithChief_11.speaker: Rozzak
AD_WithChief_11.text: Wot are we waitin' for? Spears are sharp, the lads are all riled up an' ready!
AD_WithChief_11.context: NodeContext: confident, addressing a superior but thinks he's impressed her

AD_WithChief_1.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_WithChief_1.text: You have already failed me once, and now you dare question me?
AD_WithChief_1.context: NodeContext: cold, quiet, scary, responding to a goblin who isn't showing due respect

AD_WithChief_7.speaker: Rozzak
AD_WithChief_7.text: I, er... didn't mean nothin' by it, yer ladyship. Honest I didn't.
AD_WithChief_7.context: NodeContext: whining, afraid -  trying to get back on the good side of a superior who he has disappointed

AD_WithChief_9.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_WithChief_9.text: Your life, much like your words, is meaningless, whelp. End the latter to save the former.
AD_WithChief_9.context: NodeContext: cool, calm and sinister - it's a threat to kill a subordinate unless that subordinate stops talking

AD_WithChief_14.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_WithChief_14.text: How many raiders do we have?

AD_WithChief_13.speaker: Rozzak
AD_WithChief_13.text: Plenty of lashers, loads of hunters... and a few pariahs to carry the powder kegs.
AD_WithChief_13.context: NodeContext: Listing available goblins for a raid - 'lashers' 'hunters' and 'pariahs' are goblin castes - from highest to lowest.

AD_WithChief_16.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_WithChief_16.text: These pariahs - they're prepared to fight for the Absolute?

AD_WithChief_2.speaker: Rozzak
AD_WithChief_2.text: What they do ain't exactly fightin'. All they gotta do is light up their powder and burn.
AD_WithChief_2.context: NodeContext: describing the 'sapper' goblins who run into combat with explosive barrels on their back and explode.

AD_WithChief_6.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_WithChief_6.text: Then they're prepared to die for the Absolute. Good.

AD_WithChief_12.speaker: Rozzak
AD_WithChief_12.text: Dyin's the only thing they're good at.
AD_WithChief_12.context: NodeContext: with a shrug - describing the goblin sappers who blow themselves up in combat.

AD_CunningLeaving_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Nass
AD_CunningLeaving_0.context: NodeContext: rawl-TOOSH! (Long oo, like soon, not like foot.) - exclamation of joy, preparing to head out on a raid

AD_WaitingBrave_0.speaker: Rozzak
AD_WaitingBrave_0.text: This is the big one, lads! And I'll get more kills than any of ya!
AD_WaitingBrave_0.context: NodeContext: excited shout as he prepares to set out on a raid

AD_WaitingBold_0.speaker: Warrior Clack
AD_WaitingBold_0.context: NodeContext: shouting, rowdy, preparing to head out on a raid

AD_DrowLeaving1_0.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_DrowLeaving1_0.text: Gather the raiders. It is time.
AD_DrowLeaving1_0.context: NodeContext: ordering a goblin warchief to gather raiders for a raid

AD_WaitingHardy_0.speaker: Brawler Gurd
AD_WaitingHardy_0.context: NodeContext: Shouting excitedly as he prepares to set out on a raid

AD_BossLeaving4_0.speaker: Rozzak
AD_BossLeaving4_0.text: Get your arse movin'! Don't wanna keep the drow waitin', do ya?
AD_BossLeaving4_0.context: NodeContext: a goblin warchief shouts orders to a raider as he gathers them for a raid

AD_WaitingCunning_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Nass
AD_WaitingCunning_0.text: Nobody's gonna lay a finger on me. Not this time!
AD_WaitingCunning_0.context: NodeContext: worgs are the goblins wolf-like warbeasts. Shouting excitedly while gathered to head out on a raid

AD_WaitingStupid_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Eef
AD_WaitingStupid_0.context: NodeContext: excited exclamation as the goblins prepare to set out on a raid

AD_WithPatrol_1.speaker: Zurga
AD_WithPatrol_1.text: Sorry to bother you, mistress... got a message from the guards.

AD_WithPatrol_7.speaker: Zurga
AD_WithPatrol_7.text: We got visitors - more True Souls like yerself.

AD_WithPatrol_0.speaker: Zurga
AD_WithPatrol_0.text: We got visitors. Dunno who they are - mercenaries maybe?

AD_WithPatrol_9.speaker: Zurga
AD_WithPatrol_9.text: Raiders are just waiting for the word, mistress. We're ready for anything.

AD_WithPatrol_11.speaker: Zurga
AD_WithPatrol_11.text: Prisoner's lost a lot of blood, yer ladyship. Still ain't talkin.

AD_WithPatrol_5.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_WithPatrol_5.text: Tell them to stop cutting him - we need him alive.

AD_WithPatrol_10.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_WithPatrol_10.text: Break his bones instead. Start with the fingers.

AD_DrowLeavingReady_0.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_DrowLeavingReady_0.text: We will strike in the name of the Absolute!
AD_DrowLeavingReady_0.context: NodeContext: speaking to subordinates before setting out on a raid - projecting her voice to the group who are arrayed before her

AD_DrowLeavingReady_1.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_DrowLeavingReady_1.text: If you fail me, the spiders will feed on your bones!
AD_DrowLeavingReady_1.context: NodeContext: speaking to subordinates before setting out on a raid - projecting her voice to the group who are arrayed before her

AD_DrowLeavingReady_3.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_DrowLeavingReady_3.text: You follow my lead on this raid, creatures!
AD_DrowLeavingReady_3.context: NodeContext: speaking to subordinates before setting out on a raid - projecting her voice to the group who are arrayed before her. 'Creatures' said with disgust

AD_DrowLeavingReady_2.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_DrowLeavingReady_2.text: Do not even bleed without my permission!
AD_DrowLeavingReady_2.context: NodeContext: speaking to subordinates before setting out on a raid - projecting her voice to the group who are arrayed before her

AD_DepartingGrumpy_0.speaker: Zurga
AD_DepartingGrumpy_0.text: Try not to die, ya dump-knuckles!
AD_DepartingGrumpy_0.context: NodeContext: shouting to his fellow raiders with good humour as he runs out of the camp to take part in a raid

AD_DrowLeaves_0.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_DrowLeaves_0.text: When we reach the grove, you charge only on my command.
AD_DrowLeaves_0.context: NodeContext: Projecting her voice as she talks to a gathering of goblin raiders, preparing to set out on a raid

AD_DrowLeaves_2.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_DrowLeaves_2.context: NodeContext: Projecting her voice as she talks to a gathering of goblin raiders, preparing to set out on a raid

AD_DrowLeaves_1.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_DrowLeaves_1.context: NodeContext: Projecting her voice as she talks to a gathering of goblin raiders, preparing to set out on a raid. This is her final word - a war cry of sorts though the battle has not yet begun

AD_AttackOnDen_0.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_AttackOnDen_0.text: In the name of the Absolute! Kill them all!
AD_AttackOnDen_0.context: NodeContext: shouting commands to her forces in a large battle

AD_AttackOnDen_1.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_AttackOnDen_1.text: To the gate! Kill them all!
AD_AttackOnDen_1.context: NodeContext: shouting commands to her forces in a large battle

AD_AttackOnDen_2.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_AttackOnDen_2.context: NodeContext: shouting commands to her forces in a large battle

AD_AttackOnDen_3.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_AttackOnDen_3.text: Join the battle, and kill them all!
AD_AttackOnDen_3.context: NodeContext: shouting commands to her forces in a large battle

AD_AttackOnDen_4.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_AttackOnDen_4.context: NodeContext: shouting commands to her forces in a large battle

AD_AttackOnDen_5.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_AttackOnDen_5.context: NodeContext: shouting commands to her forces in a large battle

AD_ArrogantLeaving_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Nass
AD_ArrogantLeaving_0.context: NodeContext: excited, responding to a raid leader as they prepare to head out for a raid

AD_WaitingGrumpy_0.speaker: Zurga
AD_WaitingGrumpy_0.context: NodeContext: gathered for a raid, rowdy, excited, impatient

AD_BossLeaving1_0.speaker: Rozzak
AD_BossLeaving1_0.text: Yes, yer ladyship. We won't let you down.

AD_DepartingChieftain_0.speaker: Skrut
AD_DepartingChieftain_0.context: NodeContext: Goblin language battle cry - translates as "ATTACK!". Shouted while setting out on a raid.  (Ke-wreck-NOR)

AD_WaitingLush_0.speaker: Tracker Azak
AD_WaitingLush_0.context: NodeContext: gathered to head out on a raid, checking with other goblins to see who's bringing the giant spiders

AD_DrowLeaving2_0.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_DrowLeaving2_0.text: Come. We have found our prey.
AD_DrowLeaving2_0.context: NodeContext: cold, arrogant - speaking to goblin raiders as she gathers them for a raid

AD_DepartingLush_0.speaker: Tracker Azak
AD_DepartingLush_0.context: NodeContext: shouting a prayer to her god as she sets out on a raid

AD_WaitingArrogant_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Neem
AD_WaitingArrogant_0.context: NodeContext: rawl-TOOSH! (Long oo, like soon, not like foot.) - exclamation of joy, preparing to head out on a raid

AD_CapturedExecuted_0.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_CapturedExecuted_0.text: Throw this snivelling wretch in the pit.
AD_CapturedExecuted_0.context: NodeContext: calm, clear, ordering a captive to be thrown into a pit of spiders, as an execution

AD_DrowLeaving3_0.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_DrowLeaving3_0.text: Join me. The Absolute demands blood.
AD_DrowLeaving3_0.context: NodeContext: malicious, a cold command - spoken by a drow commander to a goblin as she gathers a raiding party

AD_WaitingHefty_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Zami
AD_WaitingHefty_0.context: NodeContext: exclamation of joy, preparing to head out on a raid

AD_CapturedSpared_0.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_CapturedSpared_0.text: Get her out of my sight.
AD_CapturedSpared_0.context: NodeContext: containing her fury as she dismissed a goblin who let her down

AD_WaitingChieftain_0.speaker: Skrut
AD_WaitingChieftain_0.context: NodeContext: TOOSH! (Long oo, like soon, not like foot.) - rowdy chant, preparing to head out on a raid

AD_BossLeaving3_0.speaker: Rozzak
AD_BossLeaving3_0.text: You slobs ready? C'mon! True Soul found our next target.
AD_BossLeaving3_0.context: NodeContext: annoyed - a goblin warchief gathers raiders as he prepares to set out on a raid

AD_CoalTrioLeaving_2.speaker: Sharp-Eye Neem
AD_CoalTrioLeaving_2.context: NodeContext: To nearby goblins as they prepare to head out on a raid

AD_CoalTrioLeaving_1.speaker: Sharp-Eye Nass
AD_CoalTrioLeaving_1.text: You was born in a ditch. C'mon.
AD_CoalTrioLeaving_1.context: NodeContext: responding to another goblin saying "I was born ready". Mocking as they head out on a raid

AD_StupidLeaving_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Eef
AD_StupidLeaving_0.text: Drow comin' too? She'll rip 'em to bits!
AD_StupidLeaving_0.context: NodeContext: preparing to head out on a raid - in awe that a drow is joining them. Excited
